name: address
description:
The address command extracts structured address information from OSM data. It captures:

- House numbers and street names
- City, postcode, state, country
- Unit numbers and building names
- POI names at addresses

Useful for geocoding databases and address analysis.

options.-f, --format: Output format: csv, json, geojson (default: csv)
options.--complete-only: Only addresses with street and housenumber

output:
Address records with fields:
- housenumber, street, unit
- city, suburb, postcode
- state, country
- name (for POIs)
- lat, lon coordinates
